title: Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup Easter Egg?
body:
So my sister had been playing the poro roundup for a while, and she noticed during the change from Bilgewater to Zaun a certain blue bird that was sitting on a wharf post.
Now, being a player that mains {{champion:133}}, I do ask someone at Riot, is that Valor sitting on that post?

If yes then the real questions begin, such as, what the hell is he even doing there...?

replies.body:
It could be Valor, its more likely that its just a blue bird (valour is one of a species remember) 
as to why he is there, if it is indeed Valor,  Quinn/Valor are scouts remember and Zaun is allied with Noxus, and so as an enemy of Damacia its natural that he would scout their territory.
good spotting though!
All it would mean is that Valor wouldn't be the last of his species I guess
Are there any rewards for playing this game? Got up to thresh then ff@20
Getting up to Corki is the best thing I've seen by Riot for a long, long time.
